name: COMPetition
description:
Point and click game about competing AIs.

Made under 30 hours during Slavic Game Jam 2018 in Warsaw without prior knowledge of the used game engine, meaning I had to learn the engine and develop the game on the spot. 

Extra soundtrack by Liz Katrin (made during SGJ 2018)

The game opens in a browser supporting Adobe Flash. Alternatively you can download and unpack archived .swf and then open it in a browser.
